creator: egcs@21cn.com
text:
jasper generate invalid package name for 'template_resource/1.jsp' 
like 'package jsp.foresee.template_resource.02', java name '_1_jsp.java' is OK.
*** Bug 20347 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com

text:
I tried the version on Solaris, and the package name generated was
org.apache.jsp.  In fact, the generated package name is always org.apache.jsp,
so I fail to see how it could be otherwise.
creator: kin-man.chung@sun.com
